name: Stardust ★ Arcadis
description:
Stardust ★ Arcadis is a visual novel centered around life in this cyberpunk neocity called Arcadis. 

In this game, you play as a character who has just been selected to become a Commander – a person in charge of a team of Officers – for a month, yet who also has to deal with the demons of their past and the aftermath of being involved in a bank heist.

Make decisions to better the life of Arcadens, spend time at the bot-diner to get to know fellow citizens, deal with lots of paperwork and personal issues, and discover Erina’s story as she lives in this weird city. 

DEMO 1 FEATURES:

  • 45 minutes of gameplay
  • 3 full in-game days
  • Every single character appearing at least once

DEMO 2 WILL FEATURE:

  • 1 hour and 45 minutes of gameplay (approx.)
  • One full in-game week
  • Every single character appearing at least twice
  • Additional councelling scene  
  • One potential bad ending

FINAL GAME WILL FEATURE:

  • 7-8 hours of gameplay
  • A month of in-game time
  • Three unlockable characters
  • Four different "main" endings
  • Two unlockable endings per character
  • Six different endings surrounding choices made as a Commander
  • Two bad endings
  • English & French version (French version will be released after the initial game to give the team time to translate it)

Due to the genre and the setting, Stardust ★ Arcadis is a game dealing with many adult topics. 

While it only grazes the surface of most, some are more anchored into the story than others. It is not a game for you if any of these themes cause distress of discomfort: parental neglect & abuse / parentification, effects of long-term illnesses, discrimination* , severe injuries, financial instability / insecurity, grief, depression, substance abuse. 

None of these appear in demo 1, but will appear in the final game. 

* Towards hybrids and cyborgs only. There is no racism / sexism / homophobia / biphobia / transphobia / etc in S★A.


  • Art, Story, Coding, Backgrounds - RainSpice (Instagram)
  • Music - Andrea Baroni / Cyberleaf Studio (Itchi.io)
